name: Sperma
storyline: Sperma is a single player roguelite about getting fertilized. Players control a fleet of spermoids that all have their own opinions about which direction to advance. Take charge and guide the spermoids to their ovarian objective. Upgrade your load to enhance the fleet's size, agility, and morale. Unlock spermoid injectors to personalize your insertion preferences.
summary: Experience a roguelite in a fashion you never asked for. Command a fleet of brave spermoids, upgrade your load, and save the world by getting fertilized!
